headline: Waters Corp. Deal for Becton Dickinson Unit a Long-Term Play With Some Risks
summary: A deal for Becton Dickinson’s biosciences and diagnostic solutions unit puts Waters Corp. in a greater position to compete with larger life-science companies, but integration risks can’t be discounted, analysts say.

raw.headline: Waters Corp. Deal for Becton Dickinson Unit a Long-Term Play With Some Risks
raw.summary: A deal for Becton Dickinson’s biosciences and diagnostic solutions unit puts Waters Corp. in a greater position to compete with larger life-science companies, but integration risks can’t be discounted, analysts say.

headline: Waters, BD Bioscience deal ‘looks to be a good fit,’ says Stifel
summary: Waters (WAT) announced that it is combining with BD’s (BDX) Bioscience and Diagnostics business in a tax-efficient Reverse Morris Trust transaction that is valued at roughly $17.5B, marking a major strategic step for Waters, as the deal is large and transformative, Stifel analyst Daniel Arias tells investors in a research note. The move looks to be a good fit, though the size and complexity of the deal has to be acknowledged, Stifel says. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-

headline: Waters deal adds variables to ‘clean’ story, says Jefferies
summary: Jefferies expects shares of Waters (WAT) to trade down on the combination with Beckton Dickinson (BDX) via a reverse merger trust due to the deal size and “variables added to a clean replacement cycle story.” However, longer term, Jefferies likes the merits of the deal, saying it creates real scale, which has proven effective in the space. It keeps a Buy rating on Waters, which is trading down 13% to $306.92 in morning trading. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, marke

headline: BD Partners With Waters to Build High-Volume Diagnostics Leader
summary: BDX collaborates with Waters in a $17.5B deal to form a diagnostics powerhouse targeting $9B in revenues by 2030.

raw.headline: BD Partners With Waters to Build High-Volume Diagnostics Leader
raw.summary: BDX collaborates with Waters in a $17.5B deal to form a diagnostics powerhouse targeting $9B in revenues by 2030.

headline: BD Biosciences & Diagnostic Solutions and Waters to merge in $17.5bn deal
summary: The transaction, approved by both companies' boards of directors, is expected to close by the end of the first quarter of 2026.

raw.headline: BD Biosciences & Diagnostic Solutions and Waters to merge in $17.5bn deal

headline: Becton, Dickinson and Company: A Solid Divestment For Its Bioscience And Diagnostics Business
summary: Becton, Dickinson's divestment enhances focus, reduces leverage, funds buybacks, and unlocks value. Read more about the M&A and why I remain bullish on BDX.

raw.headline: Becton, Dickinson and Company: A Solid Divestment For Its Bioscience And Diagnostics Business

headline: Waters: Becoming A Diversified Giant Following The Becton Diagnostics Merger
summary: Waters Corp.'s $17.5B merger with BD Biosciences aims to double revenue but raises risks. Read here for an investment analysis of WAT stock.
